title: MTA members divided over union injection into debate over Israel - Hamas war
message:
Garcia’s support for the MTA withered with each new action, as she and other Jewish members repeatedly raised concerns about antisemitism.
AdvertisementThe division over the Israel-Hamas war is pitting members against one another in the state’s largest teachers union.
The MTA is far from being alone in contending with differing viewpoints on the Israel-Hamas war among its members.
The MTA first officially waded into the Israel-Hamas war on Nov. 4, when its executive board called for a cease-fire between Israel and Hamas.
Many Jewish members urged the MTA to scrap the webinar.

title: Faith leaders urge UCSD to bar Islamophobic speakers from campus
message:
SAN DIEGO (FOX 5/KUSI) — A coalition of faith leaders gathered at UC San Diego on Friday to call on the university’s administration to do better to address Islamophobia on campus after a student organization hosted a controversial speaker known for anti-Muslim rhetoric.
The collective of faith leaders, which included Islamic, Christian and Jewish clergy, described his presence on campus as an exemplar of a larger rise in Islamophobia spurred by the Israel-Hamas war that has made Muslim UCSD students feel unsafe on campus.
“We are here to tell the UCSD Administration, the chancellor, that these speakers are not welcome,” said Taha Hassane, imam of the Islamic Center of San Diego.
Hundreds of campus community members have also begun to call for Khosla’s resignation over his response to the encampment.

title: College Professors Are Being Fired for Activism on Gaza War
message:
That’s because many of the professors most supportive of Palestine don’t have jobs anymore.
From campus to campus, professors have defended students’ right to protest, but when scholars themselves espouse support for Palestine and opposition to the Israeli state, professional consequences have frequently been grave.
By and large, professors facing job loss and suspensions over Palestine have brought these allegations into public view by speaking out themselves.
All of them have been in support of the Palestinian cause.”We are at the dawn of a “new McCarthyism,” Levy said.
In the last months, school administrators called in riot cops to clear student encampments and arrest thousands at Columbia University, City College of New York, Emerson College, Emory University, New York University, the University of Austin at Texas, and more.
